hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that :Allah's Messenger said: "Whoever continuously performs the two Rak'ah of Ad-Duha his sins will be forgiven, even if they be like the foam of the sea

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَلاَةِ الضُّحَى
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Duha Prayer
